overview: This film covers more than 500 miles of the C&NW mainline west from Chicago to Omaha and Fremont, Nebraska. There is a wide variety of freight locomotives, ranging from the 1950 GP7s to new diesels built in the 1990's. In addition to the freight of the mainline you will enjoy plenty of Chicago Metra passenger trains on the Northwestern, and even ride the cab for a while.
title: Chicago & North Western Mainline West
